description:
Beneath the fading town of Dirtmouth sleeps a vast, ancient kingdom. Many are drawn beneath the surface,
searching for riches, or glory, or answers to old secrets.

As the enigmatic Knight, you’ll traverse the depths, unravel its mysteries and conquer its evils.

1.0.0-alpha1.description:
### New Beta APworld for Hollow Knight
Current Archipelago and APMapMod releases are compatible

Changes include: 
* Years(?) of logic updates from upstream
* Tuk egg is now randomized
* Alternate start locations
    * Note: not all start locations are valid for all settings, and currently random choices are not supported "nicely" so expect all random yamls to get option errors
* Shriek Pogos and Slope Ball options

A warning:
Generation times currently are much longer than many other worlds, ideally part of this alpha process is optimizing the heavy parts of hk generation and bringing it back down to reasonable.
1.0.0-alpha1.title: HK Beta Release Alpha 1

1.0.1.description:
Changes:
* Fix white palace exclusions plus a test to make sure it stays working
* Filtered down start locations to exclude ER-only starts until ER is implemented
* Minor typing refactor

No client updates needed
1.0.1.title: HK Beta Release Alpha 2

1.0.2.description:
- Add workaround to worlds breaking on early collectionstate
  - to use make sure all hk players are using vanilla kings pass start location 
- fix vanilla swim only start location validation
1.0.2.title: HK 1.0.2

1.0.3.description: Updated logic to current rando4 release
1.0.3.title: HK 1.0.3
